PHRASE.LANG: Tatuaggio con Serpente Animata sul braccio
Tatuaje de Serpiente Animada en el brazo
Living Ink: Animated Snake Tattoo. These slithering companions will glide across your arms in never-ending spirals.[#Legal]
Living Ink: Tatouage de serpent anime. Ces reptiles vont glisser a travers ton bras dans d'interminables spirales.[#Legal]
Living Ink: Lebhaftes Schlangen-Tattoo. Diese schlitternden Freunde schlängeln sich in unendlichen Spiralen um deinen Arm. [#Legal]
Living Ink: Tatuaggio con Serpente Animata. Questi compagni viscidi scivoleranno sulle tue braccia in uno spiraglio senza fine.[#Legal]
Living Ink: Tatuaje de Serpiente Animada. Estos compañeros escurridizos se deslizaràn por tus brazos en un sin fin de espirales.[#Legal]
Living Ink: Animated Snake Tattoo. These slithering companions will glide across your arms in never-ending spirals.[#Legal]
